名称: Like a Lamb to the Slaughter
描述: Witness the fate of a Charon… or perhaps every Charon.
As the carousel of time spins, echoes ride phantom steeds.
Leave a light in Glevum Pit for those who follow.
Settle down at the Sanctuary.
If I can't live like a person, then at least let me die like one.
This photo cradles the echo of your name, the shadow of my voice.
Survive Outsider's rigorous training.
Row against the current, borne back to bygone days.
A world anew, beginnings untold.
I'm here to take you home.
Overload the Phoxichor Tanks to destroy the engine room.
Use the turrets to blast open a path to the Central Control Room.
Tick, tock...
Never tempt fate by saying, "I'll do it once the war is over."
If there's only room for one under the brolly, I'll brave the rain with you all.
Reborn from the cage of a raging inferno.

Complete the quest "The Scarlet Land"

Confront the monsters that once wounded you.
"I'll never let anyone die to Filthoids again."
Land a big fish for the residents of Mist Aken.
We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
I pictured our reunion countless times — but never like this.
Tear the cage apart — even if it leaves your hands in tatters.
"To the only successful performance of my life."
